actions.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 188 (Roll no. 195).
Mr. Price (GA) demanded a separate vote on the Cohen amendment (A003).
On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 184, 4 Present (Roll no. 199).

description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-74 to establish a program to coordinate with state and local governments to enable minimize the need for transportation of toxic inhalation hazardous materials by rail.
purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-74 to establish a program to coordinate with state and local governments to enable minimize the need for transportation of toxic inhalation hazardous materials by rail.
